title: Suspect in killing of 4 in Georgia is shot dead after manhunt
description: A suspect accused of killing four people in a Georgia suburb just south of Atlanta on Saturday was killed following a manhunt, officials said.

title: Ron DeSantis says he would consider Iowa Gov. Kim Reynolds as his running mate
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, a 2024 Republican presidential contender, said Saturday that he would consider Iowa Gov.

title: Carlos Alcaraz ends Novak Djokovic’s long Wimbledon reign in 5-set victory
description: Carlos Alcaraz heralded the changing of the guard in men’s tennis as he ended Novak Djokovic’s long reign at Wimbledon with a rip-roaring 1-6 7-6(6) 6-1 3-6 6-4 victory to win the All England Club title for the first time on Sunday.

title: Over 1,000 U.S. flights canceled as severe storms take aim at the Northeast
description: Over 1,000 flights in and out of the Northeast have been canceled as storms continued to batter the region over the weekend.

title: Firefighters are leaving the U.S. Forest Service for better pay and benefits
description: Thousands of U.S. Forest Service firefighters could walk off the job if Congress fails to pass a permanent pay increase.

title: Couple who helped nab survivalist inmate say they spotted him 'camping' near property
description: The couple who called in the tip that led to capturing a escaped Pennsylvania inmate who is suspected in several crimes

title: Sen. Tammy Duckworth: Tuberville’s military blockade is 'jeopardizing our nation’s ability to lead the free world'
description: Sen. Tammy Duckworth, a member of the Armed Services Committee, said Sen. Tuberville’s blockade of hundreds of military nominations is "beyond distressing."

title: New laws remove obstacles for DACA recipients who want to become police officers
description: As police departments struggle to recruit and retain officers, some look to a previously untapped pool of applicants to fill job vacancies.

title: NSA Jake Sullivan defends U.S’ 'moral authority' to send cluster bombs to Ukraine
description: NSA Jake Sullivan on Sunday defended the Biden administration’s decision to send cluster munitions to Ukraine in a U.S. military aid package.

title: 9-month-old among missing as 3 dead, 4 others unaccounted for in Pennsylvania flash floods
description: Authorities are searching for four people, including an infant, after flash floods in Bucks County, Pennsylvania killed three people on Saturday.

title: Wall Street execs make first bets against Donald Trump in 2024
description: A wave of executives in the finance sector made early donations to Republican primary opponents of Donald Trump in the second quarter.

title: How one U.S. drugmaker contributed to the escalating drug shortage crisis
description: Akorn Pharmaceuticals abruptly filed for bankruptcy earlier this year, affecting hospitals and Americans across the U.S.

title: In ‘warfare against renters,’ homeowners fight affordable housing push
description: Local officials pushing to increase the housing supply in response to surging rents and home prices met with opposition.

title: LIVE BLOG
description: Live updates and latest news coverage on the excessive heat temperatures across the U.S

title: Ron DeSantis fires roughly a dozen staffers in a campaign shake-up
description: Ron DeSantis’ presidential campaign has fired roughly a dozen staffers — and more are expected in the coming weeks as he shakes up his operations.
